channel.title: Err i need a lil help :O with talking to npc's
channel.description: you know when you talk to the banker and he say like do you want to acces ur bank acc etc... how do i add one of them is it in [code]case 3[/code] cause i dont wanna change it without knowing whats what

item.title: Err i need a lil help :O with talking to npc's
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

This is what i have:

[code] case 1:

		/*
		 * sendFrame200(4901, 554); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo),
		 * 4902); sendFrame126("Good day, how can I help you?", 4904);
		 * sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900);
		 */
		sendFrame200(4883, 591);
		sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
		sendFrame126("Good day, how can I help you?", 4885);
		sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
		sendFrame164(4882);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;

	case 2:
		sendFrame171(1, 2465);
		sendFrame171(0, 2468);
		sendFrame126("What would you like to say?", 2460);
		sendFrame126("I'd like to access my bank account, please.", 2461);
		sendFrame126("I'd like to check my PIN settings.", 2462);
		sendFrame164(2459);
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		break;[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Err i need a lil help :O with talking to npc's

item.title: Err i need a lil help :O with talking to npc's
item.dc:creator: @Bathus_Dio1 Bathus_Dio
item.description:
@Bathus_Dio1 wrote:

Are you talking about in a client or server?

In a server you go to NPC handler and search for what the banker says and change it to what you want and compile.

I don’t know how to edit it with a client

Read full topic
